type.name: Debug
type.summary: Provides methods that may assist during development and troubleshooting.

method.name: Assert
method.summary: Checks the specified condition and if the specified condition is false, raises an error that will abort the execution of the current rule.

method.name: Break
method.summary: Signals a breakpoint to the attached debugger. If no debugger is attached this method has no effect.

method.name: Dump
method.summary: Prints the content of the specified object in the console, including all its properties, be it scalars, collections and other data structures.

method.name: Dump
method.summary: Prints the explixitly given name and the content of the specified object in the console, including all its properties, be it scalars, collections and other data structures.

method.name: Message
method.summary: Prints the specified message in the console.

type.remarks: These methods work only if the tool is run in debug mode. See option --debug form more details.
